page.title: 17RYE HILL UNITS
page.content: At the bottom of Rye Hill there are 27 units.Units are homes for old people.At the top end of Rye Hill there are also 27 units, 54 in all. Two wardens control the units one at the top and one at the bottom.Both wardens have two days off a week.The other warden looks after all 54 units on those days. There are also many houses on Rye Hill but there are only two shops on the whole estate.They are a Newsagent and an Off License.These are in Montague Crescent.There is also only one Post Box on the Estate. Two bus routes,number 3 and number 7 serve the Rye Hill estate.So there is one bus every 30 minutes to Town Centre on weekdays.There are less buses on Sundays.
